Rules.InvariantScript:
If( 
ThisItem.Value = 0,
"( " & 
CountRows(Filter( comp_month_selection1_v01.Items_Month,CompStatus="Completed")) & " / " & 
CountRows(comp_month_selection1_v01.Items_Month) & " )" 
, 
// 25-08-16 변경

If( CountRows(Filter(_col_history_order_year, Month(field_48) = Value(ThisItem.Value))) = 0 , Blank(), 
 CountRows(Filter(_col_history_order_year, Month(field_48) = Value(ThisItem.Value))) 
))
*/

CountRows(Filter(comp_month_selection1_v01.Items_Month, CompMonth = Value(ThisItem.Value) && CompStatus="Completed" )) & " / " & 
CountRows(Filter(comp_month_selection1_v01.Items_Month,  CompMonth = Value(ThisItem.Value))) & " )" 
)
